Conversations API

List all conversations

GET

/

public

/

api

/

v1

/

inboxes

/

{inbox\_identifier}

/

contacts

/

{contact\_identifier}

/

conversations

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/public/api/v1/inboxes/{inbox_identifier}/contacts/{contact_identifier}/conversations
```

200

401

Copy

```
[\
  {\
    "id": 123,\
    "inbox_id": "<string>",\
    "messages": [\
      {\
        "id": 123,\
        "content": "<string>",\
        "account_id": 123,\
        "inbox_id": 123,\
        "conversation_id": 123,\
        "message_type": 0,\
        "created_at": 123,\
        "updated_at": 123,\
        "private": true,\
        "status": "sent",\
        "source_id": "<string>",\
        "content_type": "text",\
        "content_attributes": {},\
        "sender_type": "contact",\
        "sender_id": 123,\
        "external_source_ids": {},\
        "additional_attributes": {},\
        "processed_message_content": "<string>",\
        "sentiment": {},\
        "conversation": {},\
        "attachment": {},\
        "sender": {}\
      }\
    ],\
    "contact": {}\
  }\
]
```

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#parameter-inbox-identifier)

inbox\_identifier

string

required

The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#parameter-contact-identifier)

contact\_identifier

string

required

The source id of contact obtained on contact create

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-id)

id

integer

Id of the conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-inbox-id)

inbox\_id

string

The inbox id of the conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-messages)

messages

object\[\]

Messages in the conversation

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-id)

id

number

The ID of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-content)

content

string

The text content of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-account-id)

account\_id

number

The ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-inbox-id)

inbox\_id

number

The ID of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

number

The ID of the conversation

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-message-type)

message\_type

enum<integer>

The type of the message

Available options:

`0`,

`1`,

`2`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-created-at)

created\_at

integer

The time at which message was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-updated-at)

updated\_at

integer

The time at which message was updated

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-private)

private

boolean

The flags which shows whether the message is private or not

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-status)

status

enum<string>

The status of the message

Available options:

`sent`,

`delivered`,

`read`,

`failed`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

The source ID of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-content-type)

content\_type

enum<string>

The type of the template message

Available options:

`text`,

`input_select`,

`cards`,

`form`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-content-attributes)

content\_attributes

object

The content attributes for each content\_type

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-sender-type)

sender\_type

enum<string>

The type of the sender

Available options:

`contact`,

`agent`,

`agent_bot`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-sender-id)

sender\_id

number

The ID of the sender

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-external-source-ids)

external\_source\_ids

object

The external source IDs of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-additional-attributes)

additional\_attributes

object

The additional attributes of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-processed-message-content)

processed\_message\_content

string

The processed message content

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-sentiment)

sentiment

object

The sentiment of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-conversation)

conversation

object

The conversation object

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-attachment)

attachment

object

The file object attached to the image

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-sender)

sender

object

User/Agent/AgentBot object

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/list-all-conversations#response-contact)

contact

object

The contact information associated to the conversation
